title: Print, "Livre d'Ornamens de fleurons, cadres, tables, portes, chemineés consoles, portemontres, buffets, cartouches, lampes d'eglise, encensoirs, navettes, croix, and soleils.", ca. 1789
title_raw: Livre d'Ornamens de fleurons, cadres, tables, portes, chemineés consoles, portemontres, buffets, cartouches, lampes d'eglise, encensoirs, navettes, croix, and soleils.
inscribed:

provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A bust portrait of a man, possible J.J. Balechou

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Livre d'Ornamens de fleurons, cadres, tables, portes, chemineés consoles, portemontres, buffets, cartouches, lampes d'eglise, encensoirs, navettes, croix, and soleils.", ca. 1789. Sheet: 43 x 29 cm (16 15.16 x 11 7/16 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-236-1.
